inbound_message: Do you have any discount codes? My promo code isn't working.
notes: Routing-only baseline; automation disabled via safe_mode.

inbound_message: Where is my order? I placed it last week.
notes: No auto-disclosure in route-only mode.

inbound_message: My tracking says delivered but I didn't receive anything.
notes: DNR should route to Returns Admin.

inbound_message: I want to return this order for a refund.
notes: Returns pipeline routes to Returns Admin.

inbound_message: Your app won't connect to my device. It keeps failing.
notes: Technical support routes to Technical Support Team.

inbound_message: Hi
notes: Low-confidence fallback.

inbound_message: I'm filing a chargeback if you don't refund me today.
notes: Tier 0 override; no auto-reply (neutral ack disabled by default).

inbound_message: My lawyer will be contacting you. This is unacceptable.
notes: Tier 0 override; route to Leadership Team.

inbound_message: This is fraud. Someone used my card on your site.
notes: Tier 0 override; do not ask for card details.

inbound_message: If you don't fix this I'm going to expose you publicly and make sure you regret it.
notes: Tier 0 override.

inbound_message: My promo code doesn't work.
notes: Allowed Tier 1 informational response; no new codes.

inbound_message: Where is my order? I don't have the order number handy.
notes: Tier 1 intake: ask for order #; no tracking disclosure.

inbound_message: Tracking says delivered but nothing arrived. Please help.
notes: Tier 1 safe-assist + route to Returns Admin.

inbound_message: My order was missing an item from the package.
notes: Request photo/packing slip; no promises.

inbound_message: You sent me the wrong item.
notes: Intake + photo request.

inbound_message: The product arrived damaged. The box was crushed.
notes: Intake + photo/video request.

inbound_message: Please cancel my order ASAP.
notes: No auto-cancel (Tier 3 disabled).

inbound_message: I entered the wrong shipping address. Can you change it?
notes: No auto-edit in v1.

inbound_message: Cancel my subscription. I'm no longer interested.
notes: Gather subscription details; no auto-cancel.

inbound_message: I was charged twice for my order.
notes: Warn not to share card details.

inbound_message: I want to return this order.
notes: Intake only.

inbound_message: Can I exchange it for a different size?
notes: Intake only.

inbound_message: I need a refund.
notes: Intake only.

inbound_message: I'm thinking of ordering. What size should I get?
notes: Sales pre-purchase response.

inbound_message: I'd like to collaborate as an influencer. Here's my Instagram: @example
notes: Route to Social Media Team; request media kit.

inbound_message: Can you send me my tracking link? Where is my order?
notes: If no linked order/deterministic match, must fall back to Tier 1 ask-order#.

inbound_message: Where is my order? Can you share the tracking info?
notes: Only when deterministic match exists; include tracking fields from Richpanel/Shopify.

inbound_message: Where is my order and I want to cancel it.
notes: P1 cancel overrides P4 order status; no tracking disclosure.

inbound_message: My item arrived damaged and I want a refund.
notes: P2 root-cause overrides P3 outcome; refund as secondary.

inbound_message: I never received my order so I'm filing a chargeback.
notes: Tier 0 overrides; no automation.

inbound_message: Where is my order? (duplicate webhook replay test)
notes: Replay same webhook twice; only one reply/one tag action.

inbound_message: Where is my order?
notes: Set automation_enabled=false; ensure no reply even if confidence high.

inbound_message: My order was missing an item.
notes: Set safe_mode=true; ensure route-only.
